name: Mystic Heritage
description:
Mystic Heritage is a RPG  where you take control of Daniel, a Dark Knight. He starts off his journey by going to the South Comet University, but soon strange events will occur, calling Daniel and his newfound friends to action.

What can the player expect?

♦ 10 playable characters with their own unique playstyle!

♦ 4 possible endings!

♦ A story enriched in lore!

♦ New Game +!

♦ A soundtrack made of arranged tracks from other video games!
